posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy a decent example (VG-EX) of the T202 depicting the Cubs trio.  
Preferrably SGC or PSA slabbed
Please PM me if you have one available, along with your asking price.
Thanks!
Jason

I do have a rather high-grade issue of this card; it is slabbed PSA 5. I am not really very interested in selling it, but I would take $800 by PayPal gift.
--Rob
[url]rjweekes@yahoo.com[/url]
